title: Google Cloud Observability - Troubleshoot the Ops Agent
abstract:
# Google Cloud Observability - Troubleshoot the Ops Agent
This document describes resoures available to help you troubleshoot problems with the installation, start-up, and running of the Ops Agent. Troubleshooting information is organized into the following sections:
- [Find troubleshooting information](/stackdriver/docs/solutions/agents/ops-agent/troubleshoot-find-info) : This document describes where can you find information that can help you determine what the problem is.
- [Troubleshoot credentials ](/stackdriver/docs/solutions/agents/ops-agent/troubleshoot-credentials) : This document describes what to do when you encounter authorization or credentials problems with the Ops Agent running on Compute Engine VMs.
- [Troubleshoot installation and start-up](/stackdriver/docs/solutions/agents/ops-agent/troubleshoot-install-startup) : This document describes what to do if the installation of the agent fails, or if the agent installs but fails to start.
- [Troubleshoot data ingestion](/stackdriver/docs/solutions/agents/ops-agent/troubleshoot-run-ingest) : This document describes what to do when the Ops Agent is running, but logs or metrics are not being ingested into Cloud Logging or Cloud Monitoring as you expect
